Description: Al-Rajhi Company for Cooperative Insurance (known as: AlRajhi Takaful) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since July 2009. AlRajhi Takaful operates within the Insurance sector focusing on Multi-line Insurance. It has company operating across Saudi Arabia, working on Property and Casualty Insurance. AlRajhi Takaful is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in July 2008.
